archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0216
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer, I want to be able to cancel my services at any time

properties.value: Is it about termination of an active service? Then why not Lifecycle="Stop"?

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both

properties.value: REQ_OSS_29, REQ_OSS_27, REQ_OSS_145, REQ_OSS_28, REQ_OSS_41, REQ_OSS_68, REQ_OSS_93, REQ_OSS_99, REQ_OSS_105, REQ_OSS_110, REQ_OSS_112, REQ_OSS_117, REQ_OSS_123, REQ_OSS_134, REQ_OSS_163
